title: The Don
description: They tried to take over from Don Alfredo. So he taught them a lesson they would never forget!Things had been quiet with Don Alfredo in prison. But now that he was out things were going to change. Do Alfredo wasn't going to let anyone take over his territory. That was a lesson that San Remo boys would ave to learn...the hard way. This is the book that uncovers the Mafia's world of violence, sex, and terror...the novel that dares to tell it all.A blockbuster novel that takes you deep inside the labyrinth of money, sex and power that rule a Mafia empire.
author: Forrest V. Perrin
